REUTERS.UNKNOWN: E F f6010 reute d f BC-CMS-ADVERTISING-NEGOT 03-17 0072

TEXT.TITLE: CMS ADVERTISING NEGOTIATES CANADIAN VENTURE
TEXT.BODY: <CMS Adversiting Inc> said it is in preliminary discussions with a Canadian group with "extensive franchise experience" for a joint venture to start up a majority-owned CMS Canadian subsidiary called CMA Advertising International of Canada. CMS also said the group intends to seek an undertaker to investigate a possible stock offering ot the subsidiary. Reuter
